mapper.select: SELECT article.article_id,article_title,article_time,user_name, tag.tag_id,tag.tag_name FROM article LEFT JOIN article_tag arta ON article.article_id = arta.article_id LEFT JOIN tag ON arta.tag_id = tag.tag_id LEFT JOIN users ON article.article_user_id = users.user_id ORDER BY article_time;

SELECT article.article_id,article_title,article_time,user_name, article_content,tag.tag_id,tag.tag_name FROM article LEFT JOIN article_tag arta ON article.article_id = arta.article_id LEFT JOIN tag ON arta.tag_id = tag.tag_id LEFT JOIN users ON article.article_user_id = users.user_id WHERE article.article_id = #{articleId};
